titleStmt.title: The chief interest of man, or, A discourse of religion, clearly demonstrating the equity of the precepts of the Gospel, and how much the due observance thereof doth conduce to the happiness and well-being as well of humane societies as of particular persons by H. Lukin.
titleStmt.author: Lukin, H. (Henry), 1628-1719.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.D. for T. Bassett,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
